description: encoding/varlen: a package for variable-length integer encoding

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

There are many possible encodings to choose.
Is there really one that is used enough to merit
its own package?

http://codereview.appspot.com/5129051/diff/7001/src/pkg/Makefile
File src/pkg/Makefile (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5129051/diff/7001/src/pkg/Makefile#newcode80
src/pkg/Makefile:80: encoding/varlen\
it's an odd name, or maybe i'm just used to "varint". if it's just for integers, let's say that somehow here. but if it's not - and i'd like to think it can do more - let's come up with a better name. a whole package that can only write integers is pretty.... specialized

subject: code review 5129051: encoding/varlen: a package for variable-length integer ...
